thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com | 4 of 99
thread.title: Valentina

author: Valentina
title: Valentina
text: My frame is beautiful. It looks like I had a professional make a new mirror for my bathroom. The salesgirl was very friendly, patient, and helpful. I called several times with questions, both before and after I received my frame. My neighbor was so impressed that she just ordered a frame for her bathroom. The only reason I didn't give a 5 star rating is because it wasn't as easy to put together as the video showed, but that could be that I did the project alone. I;m sure it would have been easier if I had help.
